steps.title: Initiation
steps.description: Simply voice or type your idea or you can even plug your existing project management platforms to huzlr. Your AI agent instantly analyzes intent, clarifies requirements, and structures a complete project definition for your approval.

steps.title: Agent driven planning
steps.description: Agents autonomously generate a comprehensive execution plan with priorities, dependencies, and milestones. You simply review the blueprint no manual planning required.

steps.title: Continuous Execution and Monitoring
steps.description: AI co-pilots drive the workflow, generating assets while predicting risks in real time. The system self corrects and keeps you informed, requiring only strategic oversight.

steps.title: Deliver and feedback
steps.description: Your agent verifies all requirements, packages final artifacts, and ensures delivery standards are met. You receive a completed project ready for final sign-off.
